tooltipNotifications.displayString: This weapon has active Deepsight Resonance that can be progressed.
This weapon has Resonant Elements available to be extracted. Open the details screen of the weapon to extract.

0:6857689.flavorText: "When the lake used to freeze, people would dance on the ice wearing boots with tiny swords. And fall in love."
0:6857689.displaySource: Random Perks: This item cannot be reacquired from Collections.

displayProperties.description:
Sharp Hand Cannon sight. 
  •  Increases range
  •  Slightly decreases stability
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
displayProperties.name: Crossfire HCS

displayProperties.description:
Pinpoint Hand Cannon sight. 
  •  Increases range
  •  Decreases stability
  •  Decreases handling speed
displayProperties.name: Sureshot HCS

displayProperties.description:
Balanced Hand Cannon sight.
  •  Slightly increases range
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
displayProperties.name: TrueSight HCS

displayProperties.description:
Accurate Hand Cannon sight. 
  •  Slightly increases range
displayProperties.name: HitMark HCS

displayProperties.description:
Agile Hand Cannon sight.
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases stability
displayProperties.name: Fastdraw HCS

displayProperties.description:
Stable Hand Cannon sight. 
  •  Increases stability
  •  Increases handling speed
displayProperties.name: SteadyHand HCS

displayProperties.description:
This weapon has multiple tactical improvements.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Increases reload speed
  •  Slightly increases magazine size
displayProperties.name: Tactical Mag

displayProperties.description:
This weapon's magazine is built for higher capacity.
  •  Increases magazine size
displayProperties.name: Appended Mag

displayProperties.description: Faster reloads when the magazine is empty.
displayProperties.name: Alloy Magazine

displayProperties.description:
This weapon has a greatly increased magazine size, but reloads much slower.
  •  Greatly increases magazine size
  •  Greatly decreases reload speed
displayProperties.name: Extended Mag

displayProperties.description:
This weapon can fire longer distances.
  •  Increases range
displayProperties.name: Accurized Rounds

displayProperties.description:
This magazine is optimized for recoil control.
  •  Greatly increases stability 
  •  Slightly decreases range
displayProperties.name: Steady Rounds

displayProperties.description:
Optimized for fast reloading.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Greatly increases reload speed
displayProperties.name: Flared Magwell

displayProperties.description: Precision kills greatly decrease reload time.
displayProperties.name: Outlaw

displayProperties.description: Aiming this weapon for a short period reduces flinch.
displayProperties.name: No Distractions

displayProperties.description: Reloading after defeating a target greatly increases target acquisition and aim down sight speed for a short duration.
displayProperties.name: Tunnel Vision

displayProperties.description: Sliding partially reloads this weapon's magazine and temporarily boosts range and stability.
displayProperties.name: Slideshot

displayProperties.description: Rapidly landing precision hits will return one round to the magazine.
displayProperties.name: Triple Tap

displayProperties.description: Increases handling, reload speed, and stability for each fully charged ability.
displayProperties.name: Surplus

displayProperties.description: Improved accuracy and range on the opening shot of attack.
displayProperties.name: Opening Shot

displayProperties.description: Projectiles attached to enemies explode after a short delay.
displayProperties.name: Timed Payload

displayProperties.description: Reloading grants increased damage based on the number of rapid kills made beforehand.
displayProperties.name: Multikill Clip

displayProperties.description: Precision kills create an elemental damage explosion.
displayProperties.name: Dragonfly

displayProperties.description: Kills with this weapon generate ability energy. This energy is divided between your uncharged abilities.
displayProperties.name: Wellspring

displayProperties.description: This weapon gains increased damage from melee kills and kills with this weapon.
displayProperties.name: Swashbuckler

displayProperties.description: Maximized stats.
displayProperties.name: Masterwork

displayProperties.description: Maximized stats.
displayProperties.name: Masterwork

displayProperties.description: Maximized stats.
displayProperties.name: Masterwork

displayProperties.description: Maximized stats.
displayProperties.name: Masterwork
